Median (by Greta)
```{r}
median_func<- function(input){
#creating the new df  
new_df_median<- as.data.frame(matrix(nrow = (dim(input)[1]/3), ncol = dim(input)[2])) 
rownames(new_df_median) <- rownames(Data.copy)
colnames(new_df_median) <- colnames(RNase_Data_norm)

r<- 1   #r are the rows
while(r <= dim(input)[1]) {  
  for (c in 1:dim(input)[2]) {   
    rep1 <- input[r,c]   
     rep2 <- input[r+1,c] 
     rep3 <- input[r+2,c]
     
        median <- median(c(rep1,rep2,rep3))
        
        new_df_median[(r/3) +1,(c)] <- median
  }
        
        r = r + 3
  }
        
        return(new_df_median)
}

     
RNase_median_df = median_func(RNase_Data_norm)    
    RNase_median_df
    
Ctrl_median_df = median_func(Ctrl_Data_norm)    
    Ctrl_median_df
```
